comments:
If I choose an existing profile I created with a previous version (M7) of 
Eclipse it is not possible to edit it, the edit dialog does not appear. The 
same is also true when I want to create a new profile.

This works for me under Windows. Do you have anything in the log file. The log 
file is located in th e.metadata directory of your workspace.

I have the following entry in the logfile:
